html:
This post may contain affiliate links. Read my disclosure policy.

I am so excited to announce Skinnytaste recipes are back on the Home Chef menu for a limited time!

My meals are back on the Home Chef menu! Ten of my Skinnytaste recipes will be available on the Home Chef menu for a limited time only. Kickstart your New Year with these easy and balanced meals. Order by Thursday, December 19th to get my NEW Buffalo-Style Chicken Burrito Bowl and FAN-FAVORITE Basil-Parmesan Crusted Salmon. Pre-order for delivery next week with promo code ‘SKINNYTASTE499’ to get $4.99 per serving + Free Shipping on your First Box!

I am so excited to partner with Home Chef again this year!! I know so many of you loved seeing my recipes on their menu, so I’ve teamed up with them for a fifth time to bring easy and balanced recipes to your kitchen!

This year, we’re bringing back fan-favorite Skinnytaste meals and some fresh, new recipes for you to enjoy! Enjoy fresh, pre-portioned ingredients and easy, calorie-conscious recipes
that are flavorful and filling.

Here’s some answers to your top questions!

Can I see the menu before signing up?

Yes, you can see the full Home chef menu here! Look for the Skinnytaste menu badge to find fan-favorite meals and fresh, new recipes for a limited time only!

Home Chef Skinnytaste Menu

There are 2 Skinnytaste meals per week on the menu for 5 weeks. Order by Thursday, December 19th to get the first 2 meals. Here’s the Skinnytaste meals you will find each week:

Week 1:

(New) Buffalo-Style Chicken Burrito Bowl – with black beans and cilantro
(Fan Fave) Basil-Parmesan Crusted Salmon – with garlic zucchini and tomatoes

Week 2:

(New) Hasselback Feta Chicken Bake – with couscous
(Fan Fave) Shrimp Scampi – with broccoli orzo

WEEK 3:

(NEW) One-Pot Black Bean Vegetarian Chili – with spiced crema
(NEW) One-Pan Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry – with rice

WEEK 4:

(FAN FAVE) Peruvian-Inspired Steak – with lomo saltado sauce
(FAN FAVE) Baked Chicken Parmesan – with green beans

WEEK 5:

(NEW) One-Pan Turkey Smash Tacos – with pico de gallo and guacamole
(NEW) One-Pan Creamy Chicken Florentine – with spaghetti

Pre-order here and use code SKINNYTASTE499’ to get $4.99 per serving + Free Shipping on your First Box (new customers only).

This collaboration is sponsored by home chef.
